subject: Nobody will know bout your problems
body:
Dear valued member.
Buy your drugs from the comfort of your home and save up to 20% on pharmaceutical products with MyCanadianPharmacy. 
Receive world class pharmaceutical products and pay less than you could pay for American drugs of the same quality.

Our customers appreciate the level of our service and fast delivery.
Best regards,Leola Knox
